verses.verse: Now it came to <S%H1732>pass<s%>, as David <S%H3427>sat<s%> in his <S%H1004>house<s%>, that <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, <S%H3427>Behold<s%>, I live in an <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H730>cedars<s%>, but the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> remains under <S%H3407>curtains<s%>.
Then <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H6213>Do<s%> all that is in your <S%H3824>heart<s%>; for God is with <S%H430>you<s%>.
And it came to pass the same <S%H3915>night<s%>, that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> came to <S%H5416>Nathan<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H3212>Go<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%>, Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, You shall not <S%H1129>build<s%> me a <S%H1004>house<s%> to live <S%H3427>in<s%>:

For I have not lived <S%H3427>in<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> since the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I brought <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>; but have gone from <S%H168>tent<s%> to <S%H168>tent<s%>, and from one tabernacle to <S%H4908>another<s%>.

Wherever I have <S%H1980>walked<s%> with all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H1696>spoke<s%> I a <S%H1697>word<s%> to <S%H259>any<s%> of the <S%H8199>judges<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, whom I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H7462>feed<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Why have you not <S%H1129>built<s%> me an <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H730>cedars<s%>?

Now therefore thus shall you <S%H559>say<s%> unto my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, I <S%H3947>took<s%> you from the sheep <S%H5116>fold<s%>, even from <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, that you should be <S%H5057>ruler<s%> over my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:

And I have been with you wherever you have <S%H1980>walked<s%>, and have cut <S%H3772>off<s%> all your <S%H341>enemies<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6213>you<s%>, and have made you a <S%H8034>name<s%> like the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the great <S%H1419>men<s%> that are in the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

Also I will <S%H7760>ordain<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> for my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and will <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H7931>them<s%>, and they shall live in their <S%H7264>place<s%>, and shall be moved no <S%H1121>more<s%>; neither shall the sons of <S%H5766>wickedness<s%> <S%H1086>waste<s%> them any <S%H3254>more<s%>, as at the <S%H7223>beginning<s%>,

And since the <S%H3117>time<s%> that I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H8199>judges<s%> to be over my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>. Moreover I will <S%H3665>subdue<s%> all your <S%H341>enemies<s%>. Furthermore I <S%H5046>tell<s%> you that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H1129>build<s%> you an <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H3117>pass<s%>, when your days be <S%H4390>expired<s%> that you must <S%H3212>go<s%> to be with your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, that I will raise <S%H6965>up<s%> your <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1121>you<s%>, which shall be of your sons; and I will <S%H3559>establish<s%> his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%>.
He shall <S%H1129>build<s%> me a <S%H1004>house<s%>, and I will <S%H3559>establish<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

I will be his <S%H1>father<s%>, and he shall be my <S%H1121>son<s%>: and I will not <S%H5493>take<s%> my <S%H2617>mercy<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> from <S%H5493>him<s%>, as I took it from him that was before <S%H6440>you<s%>:

But I will <S%H5975>settle<s%> him in my <S%H1004>house<s%> and in my <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: and his <S%H3678>throne<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>evermore<s%>.
According to all these <S%H1697>words<s%>, and according to all this <S%H2377>vision<s%>, so did <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Who am <S%H3068>I<s%>, O Lord <S%H430>God<s%>, and what is my <S%H1004>house<s%>, that you have <S%H935>brought<s%> me until <S%H1988>now<s%>?

And yet this was a small <S%H6994>thing<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>; for you have also <S%H1696>spoken<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> for a great while to <S%H7350>come<s%>, and have <S%H7200>regarded<s%> me according to the <S%H8448>estate<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> of high <S%H4609>degree<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>.
What <S%H3254>can<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> speak <S%H3254>more<s%> to you for the <S%H3519>honor<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant<s%>? for you <S%H3045>know<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%>.

O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, for your <S%H5650>servant<s%>'s <S%H3820>sake<s%>, and according to your own heart, have you <S%H6213>done<s%> all this <S%H1420>greatness<s%>, in making <S%H3045>known<s%> all these great <S%H1420>things<s%>.
O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, there is none like <S%H430>you<s%>, neither is there any God <S%H2108>beside<s%> <S%H8085>you<s%>, according to all that we have heard with our <S%H241>ears<s%>.

And what <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> is like your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, whom <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H6299>redeem<s%> to be his own <S%H5971>people<s%>, to <S%H7760>make<s%> you a <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1420>greatness<s%> and <S%H3372>terribleness<s%>, by driving <S%H1644>out<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%>, whom you have <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>?
For your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> did you <S%H5414>make<s%> your own <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>; and <S%H3068>you<s%>, Lord, became their <S%H430>God<s%>.

Therefore <S%H3068>now<s%>, Lord, let the <S%H1697>thing<s%> that you have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> concerning your <S%H5650>servant<s%> and concerning his <S%H1004>house<s%> be <S%H539>established<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> as you have <S%H1696>said<s%>.

Let it even be <S%H539>established<s%>, that your <S%H8034>name<s%> may be <S%H1431>magnified<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, even a <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and let the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> be <S%H3559>established<s%> before <S%H6440>you<s%>.

For <S%H430>you<s%>, O my God, have <S%H1540>told<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> that you will <S%H1129>build<s%> him a <S%H1004>house<s%>: therefore your <S%H5650>servant<s%> has <S%H4672>found<s%> in his heart to <S%H6419>pray<s%> before <S%H6440>you<s%>.
And <S%H3068>now<s%>, Lord, you are <S%H430>God<s%>, and have <S%H1696>promised<s%> this <S%H2896>goodness<s%> unto your <S%H5650>servant<s%>:

Now therefore let it <S%H2974>please<s%> you to <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant<s%>, that it may be <S%H6440>before<s%> you for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: for you <S%H1288>bless<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and it shall be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
